revised_title: William Kingdon Spencer's Life and Contributions to Palaeozoic Starfishes and Education
tldr: The article is a biographical memoir of William Kingdon Spencer, a renowned authority on Palaeozoic starfishes and an influential figure in education. He made significant contributions to the understanding of early starfishes and worked as an Inspector of Schools at the Board of Education for 34 years. His work in East Suffolk educational development and his passion for science, horticulture, and cooking are also highlighted.
